Take your tongue out and take it back, then move it up and down. Repeat the process… [+591 chars]

articles.title: Multiple Sclerosis: Spot signs early to manage it better and lead a normal life - Citizen Matters
articles.description: An interview-based guide to Multiple Sclerosis which affects a large number of people — its symptoms, treatment and other implications.
articles.content: When Swarnalatha was diagnosed with Multiple Sclerosis she was 29 years old but the doctors say that the triggers and symptoms should have occurred much earlier. With Multiple Sclerosis being common … [+17999 chars]
